Unit 2 is on the ground floor with easy access to the shared courtyard which is furnished. The kitchen has been remodeled with modern white and wood cabinetry, quartz counters and black appliances that pairs beautifully with the white tiled bathroom and black fixtures. Off of the kitchen is a larger area for a dining table or office space to work from home, with a wall of east facing windows overlooking 7th street. The bedroom feels like a loft with an open concept that could easily double as a living room. Downstairs you have a double height living/bedroom space with a large moveable closet. Plenty of storage space. Nest thermostat for a/c and heat, Laundry in hall just across from residence. Fantastic location that's easily accessible to public transit, or walk to whole foods, coffee shops, local bars/restaurants, etc all minutes outside your door.

title: Furnished Luxury 1 Bedroom Apartment, Wood Floors, Near Restaurants
description:
Stay in a furnished luxury one bedroom one bathroom apartment home on the 11th floor in a building located on Rittenhouse Square! The renovated kitchen is fully-equipped with a gas stove, microwave, disposal, and dishwasher. Savor a cup of coffee, tea, or cocoa at the breakfast bar every morning. There is abundant closet space for plenty of storage. A must see, this home is beautiful with its wood floors and high-end furniture!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to stay in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to stores, restaurants, coffee shops, and bakeries! Target, Trader Joe's, Giant, Sue's Produce Market, Rittenhouse Market, Spruce Food Market, and Di Bruno Bros. are grocery stores within walking distance! Retail stores on Rittenhouse Row include Anthropologie, Barnes & Noble, Lagos, Tumi, Tiffany & Co., Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, Shakespeare & Co., L'Occitane, Boyds, and Sephora. Nearby dining options include: Rouge, Devon Seafood Grill, Parc, Pietro's Coal Oven Pizzeria, Alice Pizza, and Marathon Grill. Sip a coffee at Ultimo, La Colombe, Elixr, and Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Pick up a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Grab a scone at Metropolitan Bakery.
Community Features:
* 24/7 8,000 square foot resident lounge with wifi
* 24/7 Top-of-the-line fitness center
* Fitness/Yoga studio
* Sauna
* Package room
* Bike storage
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.

* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Laundry room on every floor
* Large laundry room on 3rd floor
* Attached parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
* Online resident portal for rent payments, maintenance requests, and more!
Apartment Home Features:

* Breakfast bar
* Renovated kitchen
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen counters
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave

* All utilities included

Philadelphia, PA 19103

Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearâ rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. please, Give me your phone number ...
AVAILABLE NOW: Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom/1.5 bath unit in the HEART of Passyunk Square! Your perfect morning awaits - roll out of bed and grab a coffee from Rival Brothers... or B2... or Black & Brew; spend your days and evenings "on the Ave" enjoying all of the celebrated East Passyunk boutiques, shops, salons, bars, restaurants - you name it! Upstairs are two nice sized bedrooms with ceiling fans and great closet space, a stacked washer/dryer, and a full bath with tiled tub and privacy window.

description:
The studio apartment home at 2411 is available for lease at this moment! This 400 square foot Dali studio apartment home on the 24th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home as early as August 26, 2022!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Have a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Indulge in ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a baguette at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Walnut Street Theatre. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!

title: Sunny Cozy West Philly 1-bedroom Available Sept. 1st!
description:
Available 9/1 (possibly flexible), This is a well-maintained landlord-managed apartment building. Unit has South-facing windows with beautiful natural lighting, a full kitchen, and large bedroom. Building entryway has plenty of room to safely store a bike. Access to small and private backyard area shared by tenants.
Located 1 block away from 3 out of 4 trolley lines that will get you to 30th St. station or into Center City within 15 minutes. Easy access to UPenn or Drexel, and University of the Sciences. Safe and friendly neighborhood, 2 blocks from beautiful Clark Park and all of its fun amenities and events (festivals, farmers markets, Shakespeare in the park, etc.) Nearby U-City mini-market and Salt & Pepper Deli offer selection of beer, food, and basic groceries. Only a few minutes walk or bike to excellent restaurants, bars, Mariposa co-op, and an absolutely fantastic nightlife on Baltimore Avenue.
ATTENTION DOG OWNERS: This is a great place for you and your best friend! This is a super dog-friendly neighborhood. There is tons of greenspace here and nearby Clark Park offers a large and wonderful open area to take your pup to run around off-leash.
Owner pays for water - Renter is responsible for gas and electric. Security, First, and Last month's rent due at signing. Cats and small/large dogs are permitted AS LONG as they are not a loud disturbance to other renters. Street parking is FREE, has no restrictions, and is accessible/not overcrowded - no need to park 3 blocks away to get to your car, most of the time there is space available right in front of the house. Smoking tobacco is not permitted in apartment/building.
Available 9/1 with the possibility of earlier flexibility!
Landlord pays for water - tenant responsible for gas and electric.
One Year Lease. First months rent and Security deposit due at signing.
Send an email for inquiry or to schedule a tour!
